TEXT.TITLE: JOHNSON MATTHEY'S PLATINUM GROUP PRICES
TEXT.BODY:
Johnson Matthey today issued the
following Platinum group base prices (unfabricated), all U.S.
Dlrs per troy ounce.
 Previous prices in parentheses.
 PLATINUM  -   562   (567)
 PALLADIUM -   130   (130)
 IRIDIUM   -   400   (400)
 RHODIUM     1,230 (1,230)
 RUTHENIUM -    80    (80)

